chapter.title: Control Point stack
chapter.para: The Control Point stack is designed specifically for use on Control Points. It provides the mechanism used to relay messages from the Control Point to a remote device. The Control Point stack has a layered architecture that respects the layers defined by the UPnP specification.
The Discovery and Description layers are implemented in Device and Device List classes. The Control and Eventing layers are implemented in Proxy classes.
You use Devices, Device Lists and Proxies together with the Control Point stack to pass the messages from your Control Point application to the remote device.
Details on how you use the Control Point stack and the Device, Device List and Proxy classes are contained in the following sections.
